Package org.cyclops.evilcraft.api.broom

Interface IBroomModifierRegistry

All Superinterfaces:
org.cyclops.cyclopscore.init.IRegistry
All Known Implementing Classes:
BroomModifierRegistry
public interface IBroomModifierRegistry extends org.cyclops.cyclopscore.init.IRegistry
Registry for broom modifiers.
